headline: Show HN: ColorTiles Browser Game
description:
Hello HN!

Here is a little game I made, colorful tiles must be placed next to other tiles and match in symbol or color. This game is inspired by Passage 3 and similar games like Qwirkle, Rummy or Dominoes. There exist some browser-based versions here and there, but I wasn't completely satisfied with any of them, so I made my own.

This is optimized for a broad range of screen sizes and auto-rotates the playing field for narrow (portrait) viewports. As I've discovered with my own parents, folks who enjoy playing Solitaire, Hearts and similar games might enjoy this as well, so gladly spread the word.

Have fun and feedback is appreciated! :)
description_zh-Hans:
你好，HN！

这是我做的一个小游戏，五颜六色的瓷砖必须放在其他瓷砖旁边，并在符号或颜色上匹配。 这个游戏的灵感来自Passage 3和类似的游戏，如Qwirkle、Rummy或Dominoes。 这里和那里都有一些基于浏览器的版本，但我对它们都不完全满意，所以我自己做了一个。

这是为广泛的屏幕尺寸而优化的，并为狭窄的（纵向）视口自动旋转游戏场地。 正如我在自己的父母身上发现的那样，喜欢玩纸牌、红心和类似游戏的人可能也会喜欢这个游戏，所以很乐意传播这个消息。:)
description_zh-Hant:
